segments.text: Can you show me how to use chopsticks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it is not easy to learn !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you are a quick learner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don't think I can manage with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , shall I ask the waiter to bring you a knife and fork ?
segments.speaker: S2
